
= Requirements =
  * OpenCV 2.1
  * QT
  * cmake
  * Subversion
  * Liblo

= Building = 
  * $ svn checkout https://sonic-gesture.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sonic-gesture
  * $ cd sonic-gesture
  * $ mkdir build
  * $ cd build
  * $ cmake ..
  * $ make

This will result in 2 binaries, extractor, sonicgesture. You want to run sonicgesture.

= Usage =
Use capture to capture images for training. Use train to store the training images in a classifier. Use run to actually start recognizing.
